- `python3` - The Python 3 interpreter
- `python3Packages.pip` - Package installer for Python
- `python3Packages.requests` - HTTP library for making JSON requests
- `python3Packages.urllib3` - HTTP client library
- `python3Packages.certifi` - Certificate bundle for SSL verification
- `python3Packages.setuptools` - Build system for Python packages

These packages will give you a fully functional Python environment in your terminal with the ability to:
- Make HTTP requests and handle JSON data
- Install additional packages with pip
- Handle SSL certificates properly
- Work with basic Python development tasks
